TopicTitle: Is there a CFG file generator?? for my stargate starship

Articles.Content:
I`m making a nice 3dmax starship, from stargate yep its big, so I need to get a cfg maker, really bad at making those, I use already made ones from mods and

copy past them and redo them. is there a cfg generator that I just throw my ship parts into and puff its done lol??? or I got to learn the full thing.

I look everywhere and I saw 1 cfg generator in French, but not sure what its about? didn`t find a link. look a lot, prob don`t exist, might have to get it made bya nice player?

oh if I do a ds9 spacestation later, is there a size limit on this game, as I modded elderscroll and it did.

Edited July 1, 2014 by mjy

You might get a bit more help asking in here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/37-Add-on-Development

At least, it sounds like you are modeling a new ship, rather than piecing together one from various KSP parts.

I'm not sure if there's a specific size limit on a singular part, but generally things are limited to 2.5 km because of KSP's physics range.

Sorry, but there aren't any config file creators for KSP at the moment. I might do it after studying both the KSP config system and Liberty BASIC (yes, I use an advanced version of BASIC. Suck it ;D).

Edited July 1, 2014 by FCISuperGuy
k, ty, yes might have to suck it up, but I might need someone to do it for me in the end if I`m still lost at it. will look up for more tutorals on it
